domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Automotive, Aircraft & Boat Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to automobile, spacecraft, aircraft and boat manufacturing

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Travel & Transportation Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to travel as airlines, travel agencies, hotels

domain.name: Brand
domain.description: Brands and Companies

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

domain.name: Unified Twitter Taxonomy
domain.description: A taxonomy of user interests.

data.text: @ZonCruiseFan Mijn oprechte excuses voor het ongemak. Als ik het goed begrijp heeft u een PIR aangemaakt op de luchthaven, klopt dat? U kunt de status van uw bagage hier vinden: https://t.co/jofmUthCoz. U kunt inloggen met het referentienummer (bijvoorbeeld AMSKL12345) en uw achternaam.

data.text: @Dhanush_babuH I regret reading about this unfortunate situation. If you have a Property Irregularity Report (PIR) reference number, you can trace your delayed baggage here: https://t.co/jofmUthCoz. You can log in with your PIR (example: AMSKL12345) and last name.

data.text: @Mhasanuzz I am back. Could you please send me a DM so that I could ask for other details that will help trace your baggage effectively? Moreover, I kindly advise you to delete your tweet with your PIR as it contains a private information.

urls.title: Compensatie en vergoeding voor uw vertraagde KLM-vlucht - KLM Nederland
urls.description: Is uw KLM-vlucht geannuleerd, vertraagd, of omgeboekt? Dan heeft u misschien recht op een vergoeding of een tegemoetkoming in de onverwachte kosten. - KLM Nederland
